snippet: The Mets averaged 28,035 a game, down nearly 7 percent from the 2011, while revenue dropped over all, to $121.5 million from $126.9 million.
abstract: The Mets averaged 28,035 a game, down nearly 7 percent from the 2011, while revenue dropped over all, to $121.5 million from $126.9 million.

headline.main: Attendance and Revenue Fall at Citi Field
headline.print_headline: Attendance and Revenue Fall at Citi Field
